website_summaries.verdict: Boasts advanced safety features for total confidence. Well worth taking a look at if only the safest Evenflo infant car seat will do for your precious nugget
pros: Rigorously tested for safety, including rollover incidents
Shock absorbing construction combined with an anti-rebound bar ensure babies remain safe and stable in any event
Buckle covers prevent painful contact with hot metal
TempRight fabric enhances comfort by keeping kiddos cool
cons: Base can be tricky to install
Crotch strap is on the short side

customer_reviews.title: Very safe and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love the material it's made of and the multiple adjustments for the seatbelts/harness. Has the rollover certified safety test which is always another great safety feature, it's made pretty well and clicks right into it's base with ease. Same with taking it out and carrying it around with multiple adjustments for the carrying handle. The release for loosening the harness is pretty simple to use but is a little inconvenient on location. The bases seatbelt locking device is fantastic and when put in nice and tight, that base does NOT move an inch at all! I would recommend to all new parents!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, safe and great quality for our micro preemie @ 1 lb. 14 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: This carseat has worked great to keep my daughter safe. The shoulder pads help keep the straps from digging in and the extra rollover protection gives me piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy looks good and fits in my car good thanks
customer_reviews.author: George Rank

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. It is super easy to install .
customer_reviews.author: Angel lopez

customer_reviews.title: Comes as described
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. But I came on time, brand new. Will be sure to update if I have a negative review. I feel like it may end up being too small too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Meesha

customer_reviews.title: My daughter hasn't been born yet but I would like to say that this a beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hasn't been born yet but I would like to say that this a beautiful, sturdy carseat. The quality blew me away. It's also extremely light when not attached to the base...the extra safety features are just a bonus! I can't wait to use it! :)
customer_reviews.author: SailorEve1112

customer_reviews.title: Favorite car seat! Definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: We had used this car seat for my daughter for about 7 months (may daughter is really long & I had to get a convertible car seat so her feet wouldn’t dangle out). My daughter fit so snug in her car seat, and her head NEVER tilted over when she would fall asleep in it. She never looked uncomfortable and it wasn’t difficult to strap her in . Would definitely reccomend this car seat to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: "The SafeMax Infant Car Seat is the FIRST rollover-tested car seat"
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and construction for this Evenflo SafeMax infant car seat, in particular: "The SafeMax Infant Car Seat is the FIRST rollover-tested car seat offering extended safety combined with a lightweight design that makes it easy for you to carry or travel with" This car seat, although expensive, has a lot of features most car seats we've used don't have. Everything I see seems to fall right in line with the product description, and I really appreciate the "roll-over" safety feature. I've never seen one tested or built for that before. Good going - Safety First. "The SafeMax Infant Car Seat is the FIRST rollover-tested car seat" and well worth the money for that feature alone.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Todd

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: This a really nicely designed car seat. The snap-in base for the bassinet-seat is a great feature, as you make sure your bay is comfortable strapped in the seat outside the car before snapping it into the base. This saves a lot of back strain that you usually have to deal with when trying to make sure your baby is properly secured in traditional car seats (though the seat can also be secured in the traditional manner if the base is not in a car that is being used.) The seat is easy to set-up and adjust. This is the best baby car seat I've ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Strong, safe and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding car seat. The interior is very soft and well padded. It has a very high safety rating. Best of all it is not nearly as heavy to carry when moving between vehicles as are other high end car seats we have used. It isn't featherweight, but seems very manageable. Do note that the pinkish/purple interior color is very pronounced. We like it that way, but it might not be to everyone's taste.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Horner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice..very cool features
customer_reviews.text: Very nice,very cool features, lots of new safety features, solid, pull down arm carry is a little stiff,but may just need to be used a few times
customer_reviews.author: Alan Beggerow

customer_reviews.title: Safe, cute and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: This was not only cute and safe looking, but it was easy to install. Generally a good car seat for baby that can also be taken out and used as a carrier, much like the graco. I found myself liking this one better than my old graco. Felt much safer for my baby and seemed more comfortable for him. Easier to use and install than other carseats I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wallace

product_meta.title: Evenflo SafeMax Infant Car Seat, Noelle
product_meta.description: Evenflo continues to redefine industry standards with the rollover tested SafeMax Infant Car Seat. The SafeMax Infant Car Seat offers a SafeZone Base that is designed with an anti-rebound bar to absorb and dissipate crash forces. The SafeMax Infant Car Seat allows your family to travel with peace of mind and provides extended safety in addition to a lightweight design that makes it easy for you to carry. The seat accommodates children ranging from 4-35 pounds.
feature_bullets: This Rear-Facing Infant Car Seat fitting newborns and babies from 4-35 pounds includes a stay-in-car convenience SafeZone Base made up of a combination of premium materials designed to absorb and dissipate crash forces through an anti-rebound bar
The SafeMax Infant Car Seat is the FIRST rollover-tested car seat offering extended safety combined with a lightweight design that makes it easy for you to carry or travel with
The SafeMax is equipped with Sure Safe Latch guides that make proper installation easy in cars equipped with lower latch anchors securing your child in seconds
This Infant Car Seat is equipped with a temperature regulating fabric that keeps baby comfortable during hot or cold weather, which provides a safer, more peaceful ride for you and your infant
The extremely lightweight design equipped with a padded, ergonomic handle is uniquely crafted to make carrying your infant or newborn as comfortable as possible

specifications.Care instructions: Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle, and tumble dry 10 – 15 minutes on low heat.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars25 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
